title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the Search dialog is initialized with the fully qualified name. However, it is unable to find any results. Searching via the context menu in the packages view works as expected.
EB: The Search dialog should first attempt to get the Java element when searching, and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Open the Search dialog. 
4. Search for a declaration. 
5. Note that no results are found. 

Expected behavior: 
The Search dialog should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name when no results are found. 

NOTES:
